#GrowTogether
with Indonesia Peerleaders



Initiated by PT Paragon Technology and Innovation, we believe that each individual is resourceful and can grow significantly beyond their limits by empowering them with a coaching-based peer learning program.

We aim to empower young individuals with access to self-development, soft and hard skills, and a creative learning environment, so they will be able to lead the way to create lasting impact.

Create a Lasting Impact with
#IndonesiaPeerleaders




Empowering young individuals in becoming the future leaders of the FMCG industry.
